properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued December 31 at 6:58PM PST until January 2 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 20 to 25 kt with occasional gusts to 35 kt
this evening becoming 15 to 20 kt with gusts to 25 kt tonight
through Wednesday evening. Combined seas building to 17 to 22 ft
at 19 seconds.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head
OR out 60 NM.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THURSDAY
